about_the_game:
WhiteTrick: Western

Discover WhiteTrick's new map through the WhiteTrick: Western expansion pack.

Even outside the countryside, his scam continues! He saved up as much money as he could and ran away to the West, but the police who did not give up chased White all the way to the West. Will the police be able to catch White, who runs away and continues to commit fraud?

1. New map: Western
You can see many different aspects of the West, from the past to the present. Various NPCs and cute animals that were not seen on existing maps will make the game more enjoyable!

2. Difficulty
Compared to the existing village map, both White and Police have a higher level of difficulty, making the game more tense and strategic than before.

3. BGM
You can increase your immersion in the game with BGM that matches the West.

4. Buy a host!
If you purchase this expansion pack and create a room, users who join as a guest can enjoy the game without purchasing the expansion pack.

name: WhiteTrick: Western
short_description: Even outside the countryside, his scam continues! Win the breathtaking psychological battle between the police and White. WhiteTrick is a multiplayer turn-based board game that can be enjoyed by up to 4 people.
